name: 10 seconds (itch) (alxgrade)
description:
CAN YOU BEAT ALL ENEMIES IN 10 SECONDS?! I BET YOU CAN'T!Freatures:
  • 10 seconds of pure destruction
  • Snakes and bats are bad
  • Crates are your worst enemies
  • Rotated pixels - hell for real pixel artists. Thanks goodness I'm not one of them
How to play:
  • LMB / Num 0 / Z / Ctrl - Punch
  • WASD / Arrow keys - Move
  • You don't need anything else

Music by RoccoW & xyce - De Jongens Met de Zwarte Schoenen
